Name: PuzzleKid
About the game: A 2d platformer puzzle game with unique mechanic which allow you move and rotate the level. GAME FEATURES: - Unique 'Puzzle like' machanic. - 100 fun and challenging levels. - 6 different areas,each with their own atmosphere and mechanics machanic.(Magnet,transport,electric wire etc)
